alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:13AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay, northwestern Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 700 AM EDT/600 AM CDT/... At 613 AM EDT/513 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Vernon to near Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Altha, Moose Pond, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Camps Head, Bahama Beach, Bennett, Porter Lake, Brannonville, West Bay, Gulf Lagoon Beach, Magnolia Beach and Chason. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington
